name: Deep Mine (<M/M>)
description:
Mining Cool!!!!..

Imagine mining deep into a vertically infinitely ground.. Discovering minerals, items, Upgrades, .... ... Yea..... ssssick..... Now you'll be able to actually "Mine All Day" ..... and stuff.. ...cool

A Ludum dare-48 game.....ish......... its The Deepest Mine on the planet.

Controls

A/S - Left or right

Spacebar - jump

left Click - MinE!!!!

change equipped item: Mouse wheel
